about.summary: Computes the random forest variable importance (VIMP) for the conditional inference random forest (cforest) of the 'party' package. Includes a function (varImp) that computes the VIMP for arbitrary measures from the 'measures' package. For calculating the VIMP regarding the measures accuracy and AUC two extra functions exist (varImpACC and varImpAUC).

Computes the random forest variable importance (VIMP) for the conditional inference random forest (cforest) of the 'party' package. Includes a function (varImp) that computes the VIMP for arbitrary measures from the 'measures' package. For calculating the VIMP regarding the measures accuracy and AUC two extra functions exist (varImpACC and varImpAUC).

name: r-varimp
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-varimp
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/varImp_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/varImp/varImp_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4b30ca168eccd298f9971434a84c9a6a550a3d322651ae54363b46143b76b4af

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-measures
    - r-party
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-measures
    - r-party

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('varImp')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('varImp')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=varImp
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: Computes the random forest variable importance (VIMP) for the conditional inference
    random forest (cforest) of the 'party' package. Includes a function (varImp) that
    computes the VIMP for arbitrary measures from the 'measures' package. For calculating
    the VIMP regarding the measures accuracy and AUC two extra functions exist (varImpACC
    and varImpAUC).
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
